comments.body: Let's leave an empty line here. Else LGTM

You are likely right (have to double check), OTOH, the whole file seems to not put the blank line. I was wondering a bit if we need to print out `b`, but I guess it is indeed better to do.

The whole file can probably use more fixups, but I will just put this in. Thanks @oribro and also @abhinavsagar review is much appreciated and always in short supply!
Any followup PRs welcome of course ;).
